title: FT: T206 Home Run Baker BL460 SGC 20
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Home Run Baker BL460 SGC 20
posts.post_content:
I've been toying with the idea of trading my T206 Home Run Baker with a Broadleaf 460 back.  The grade is an SGC 20.  There are 2 known Baker BL460's and this is the highest graded.  The other is an SGC 10 with extensive back damage.  BL460's are scarce, but getting one with a HOFer front is quite difficult.  They rarely come up for sale.  

I've included a front/back scan, high resolution scans, and a close up scan of the card.

I'm open to listening to trade offers.  Particularly I'm looking for any T216's I don't own (especially MINO, Virginia Extras, and Kotton Type 3 backs and HOFers), and any E94 I don't own (would prefer purple).  The E94's I own are: Bates, Chance, Crawford, Davis, Jennings, Magee, and Moore.  Other possibilities are: E98 Cobb, E95 Cobb, E90-1 Cobb, E90-1 Speaker, E93 Matty, Wagner (throwing and batting), E95 Plank, T215 Red Cross HOFer, T211 Red Sun (mid-grade).  

I'm not looking to sell the card, just possibly trading it for the right deal.  And for an absolute blockbuster deal, I would trade this BL460 Baker and a T206 Jennings (both hands) w/UZIT back PSA 2.  Scans of the Jennings are available upon request.  The Jennings is not available any other way.

If interested send me an email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]
